Class: AccountStoreMapping

AccountStoreMapping

AccountStoreMapping

This object is a base class for ApplicationAccountStoreMapping and OrganizationAccountStoreMapping. It should not be constructed manually.

An account store mapping can exist in two ways:

  • Between an Application and a Directory, Group, or Organization.

  • Between an Organization and a Directory or Group.

For more information about account store mappings, please see: Modeling Your User Base.

new AccountStoreMapping()

Source:
resource/AccountStoreMapping.js

Methods

getAccountStore()

Get the Account Store of this mapping. For an ApplicationAccountStoreMapping this will be a Directory, Group, or Organization. For an OrganizationAccountStoreMapping this will be a Directory or Group

Source:
resource/AccountStoreMapping.js
